name: Halo ATV
address: Selumbung, Manggis, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80871, Indonesia
review 1:
Our friend brought us to Halo ATV. It was my girls first time riding and also our friends first time

We had welcome drink (I think it was lemon or lemongrass) which was delicious. Short briefing about our itinerary for the day, we then proceeded to wear the rubber boots they gave and then practice with the ATV a couple of times.

We visited lots of different places and had great pictures. Jungles, temple, waterfalls, mud, water, etc. It was an amazing day and had a fun time! There's also a simple lunch of rice with some herbs/spices and egg. Also, they have shower in the facility so you can clean the mud off after the activity (bring a change of clothes)

PS
Please "like/thumbs up üëçüèª" this review if you find this helpful so it would be able to help other people as well. Thank you!
review 2:
Fantastic!
Will come back for sure!!
Halo ATV is very professional and friendly ! best people, best ATV track,!
2,5 hours of pure happiness.
Deep balinese rain forest, waterfall, everything was just so perfect!!
Sukseme semeton üôèüèº
review 3: The only ATV adventure & e-bike ride that includes with documentation (pictures & video) without paying, usually I have to pay around 400k to get all my documentations. The most fun ATV adventure I ever had in Bali with friendly and helpful guide, clean bathrooms (they have shampoo, towel, plastic for wet clothes), they also have waterproof case for your phone. I took the package that includes with pick up & drop off, lunch & welcome drink. They also bring us hiking to hidden waterfall. Amazing experience, much much recommended!!
review 4:
This is my first time doing ATV activity.

That was so amazing.
Great choice to spend time with family, friends and your group.

All staff so kind with warm service.
ATV track so challenging. We almost spend more than 2 hours including Go-Kart experience.

We also try Karangasem traditional food, call Nasi Saur with special tradition taste.

And Halo ATV have transport service to pick up around Denpasar City

Gonna be back again next time
review 5:

with the river track, the mud really makes us get us really dirty and wet but it‚Äôs so fun and the track through the village makes us see the lives of the people there!
Really recommend place to do atv when you‚Äôre here! ‚ú®‚ú®

name: Ngopi Malu
address: GG9J+58X, Jl. Bukit Catu, Selumbung, Kec. Manggis, Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Ngopi Malu is a hidden gem worth discovering! From the delicious cuisine to the exceptionally friendly service, this restaurant truly delivers. The ambiance is welcoming and inclusive, making it a perfect spot for anyone looking for a memorable dining experience. We're already planning our next visit ‚Äì it's safe to say Ngopi Malu has won us over!
review 2: We were looking for a place with nice views and this place exceeded our expectations. The visit was really worthy
review 3: Really good food and service ! The staff is lovely and the view is really nice ! Thanks üòä
review 4: pleasant ambience in the middle of the valley of Manggis. food and beverage are worth the price. there's a hot air balloon-like spot to take a picture. cleanliness in the toilet needs to be improved.
review 5: Amazing place, very good view, non experience Indonesian food
